title: yogg
author: yogg
content: Bas ColdkeyAbout 2.5 years ago, user Basorexia created artworks representing Bitcointalk members.(Here is the link to the original thread : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5204109)Towards the end, he offered physical versions of his work.People sent him BTC to arrange an order, but he never shipped a single card and finally vanished after refunding a handful of users.A physical version of these artworks have been highly hoped for, so I have been approached to produce a few custom orders.Given how popular their might be, we have decided to produce them on a regular basis and offer them for sales.Currently, Bas Coldkeys with 20 different artworks are available.Here is the list of different cards that have been produced :– Krogothmanhattan– Minerjones– Owlcatz– Tweetious– Bitcoin Penny– Jcga– Chronicsky– Digicoinuser– Fattcatt– Teegumes– Dobzombie– Agrawas– Hox– Rxalts– Lesbian cow– Chibitcty– Basorexia– Mitchell– Theymos– YoggWe might expand this list with new artworks that are available in the thread started originally by Basorexia.These are denominated with 0.001 BTC (Buyer Funded).Mintage : not finite.Price :- 40 € per Bas Coldkey. (You will get a random one)  >> https://www.coldkey.eu/product/bas-coldkey-random-single/ <<- 640 € for a full set of 20 Bas Coldkeys. >> https://www.coldkey.eu/product/bas-coldkey-full-set-of-20/ <<No further funding is required.New ones are continuously produced in batches having the same serial.When a new batch is broken, we will distribute all the remaining Bas Coldkeys in this batch before breaking a new one.Get yours by placing an order on our shop !>> https://www.coldkey.eu/shop <<

comments.author: yogg
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on September 29, 2022, 02:41:31 PMQuestions:1. Do people used on the cards get a percentage of the sales of cards with their names? No.Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on September 29, 2022, 02:41:31 PM2. I do not see the anonymousminer card - was it made originally by Basoriexia's or only by Coldkey?Some anonymousminer Bas Coldkey exist.Every Bas Coldkey bears a design that can be found in the following thread :https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5204109Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on September 29, 2022, 02:41:31 PM3. Any issue with copying/using Basoriexia's original artwork? No, for the following different reasons :After the Bas fiasco, I have been approached by a few members with custom orders for Bas Coldkeys.I've also gifted a few AP Bas Coldkeys (on Silver cards) to users represented in the artwork.Most of the time, it was merely because I knew these users nicknames on the forum so I could make a relevant gift.Over time as more people become aware that Bas Coldkey are a thing, I kept getting custom orders.This went to the point where it makes sense to acknowledge these and turn them into a series.I don't like the idea of running a "shadow series" because I'm fulfilling custom orders around the same theme.Since this thread has been posted, a handful of bitcointalk users for whose Bas made a design approached me.They would like to order some Bas Coldkeys representing "their" artworks.Back then I've approached Basorexia to collaborate but they turned me down.I'm more than happy to discuss with Basorexia about options, should they return.Quote from: Lesbian Cow on September 29, 2022, 04:01:02 PMOh wow, just saw this, glad to see these designs back, shame the original artist disappeared with our btc.Great job yogg!Thank you very much LC ! Glad you like them.
